name: My Favorite Grilled Chicken Ever
author: stylingmom
summary: Kelli Bhattacharjee gave me this recipe, which was a winner one year at Versailles Poultry Days. I made a few changes to it and this is hands down my favorite grilled chicken ever! I have literally been making it at least once a week since I've had the recipe. Try it. You won't be disappointed! This is absolutely delicious and makes a very moist and flavorful finished product.
directions: Combine vinegar, water, butter, Worcestershire sauce, garlic salt, pepper, sugar, and minced garlic in a pot
Remove from heat and let marinade cool to room temperature, at least 30 minutes
Place chicken in a resealable zip-top bag
Pour marinade over chicken, seal, and marinate, 8 hours to overnight
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate
Transfer chicken pieces to the grill, shaking off excess marinade; discard remaining marinade
Grill chicken until no longer pink in the center, 30 to 45 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
